remarks: Membership in a class abstraction, using implicit substitution.  (Closed theorem version of ~ elabg .)  (Contributed by NM, 7-Nov-2005.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 8-Jun-2011.)
statement:
elabgt $p |- ( ( A e. B /\ A. x ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) ) -> ( A e. { x | ph } <-> ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ps x $.
